alert.note: Alert for Fauquier; Prince William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 11:24PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern Virginia, including the following counties: extreme east-central Fauquier and west-central Prince William. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Fleetwood Road is closed at Cedar Run due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1122 PM EST, gauge reports indicated runoff from earlier rainfall. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Aden... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
